subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The graphing example demonstrates the integration of SchemaCrawler with JUNG.

ol.li: Install ant , and make sure that ant is on your path.
Copy the schemacrawler.config.properties file into the graphing example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Start a command shell in the graphing example directory.
Try modifying the graph size to modify the output.
